docs.text: Lectures I think the edge of lectures over papers are : - Survey-like : gain overal sight of the field - Research-Share : new inspiration, comparison with top-tier researchers - High-level-Lecture : direction of dev

docs.text: Paper Reading Diffusion Model Basic [✔] "Deep Unsupervised Learning using Nonequilibrium Thermodynamics" [---] "A Survey on Generative Diffusion Model" [✔] "Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models" [✔] "Generative Modeling by Estimating Gradients of the Data Distribution" [✔] "Denoising Diffusion Implicit Models" [✔] "Understanding Diffusion Models: A Unified Perspective" [✔] "Score-based Generative Modeling Through Stochastic Differential Equations" Planning [ ] "Planning with Diffusion for Flexible Behavior Synthesis" Polished DM [ ] "gDDIM" [ ] "DEIS" [--] "Score-based Generative Modeling with Critically-Damped Langevin Diffusion" Hot/Recent [✔] "Cold Diffusion: Inverting Arbitrary Image Transforms Without Noise" [✔] "Blurring Diffusion Model" (bridge blurring (cold) and noise-adding (heat) diffusion) [ ] "Elucidating the Design Space of Diffusion-Based Generative Models" [ ] "Analog Bits: Generating Discrete Data using Diffusion Models with Self-Conditioning" Conditional [--] "Denoising Diffusion Restoration Models" [ ] "SDEdit: Guided Image Synthesis and Editing with Stochastic Differential Equations" [ ] "LISA: Learning Interpretable Skill Abstractions from Language" 3D / 4D [ ] "3D Shape Generation and Completion through Point-Voxel Diffusion" [ ] "Diffusion Probabilistic Models for 3D Point Cloud Generation" [--] "Video Diffusion Model" [ ] "MotionDiffuse: Text-Driven Human Motion Generation with Diffusion Model" Other Applications [ ] "Label-Efficient Semantic Segmentation with Diffusion Models" [ ] Related [ ] PixelDefend: Leveraging Generative Models to Understand and Defend against Adversarial Examples Robot Learning Implicit-NeRF + Robotics Language + Multi-modal Robotics Reinforcement Learning Meta-Learning NLP
